0.1.name: wordpress/wp-license-reloaded
0.1.description:
Based on the amazing Job by Nathan R. Yergler and his WP-Licencse Plugin. This plugin Alows users to assign a Creative Commons license to content on a per post basis (or no license at all)

This plugin was made possible thanks to SocialBrite

The license chunk on the posts is wrapped in a DIV with class: wp_license
